top_comment.text:
Can we stop calling molestation rape? They are two different things and we 
should use two different words to describe them.  ﻿
top_comment.author: Trevor Colby

comments.text:
+renzokata He didn't actually have sex with his kids, he masturbated them. 
Which is why I made my comment, TYT is confusing you as to what happened by 
calling it rape instead of molestation.
comments.author: Trevor Colby

comments.text:
O.K. So his son was an infant. That's rape. He can't talk, he can't defend 
himself, and I'm sure he was hurt very badly, and probably screamed and 
cried through the whole thing. I dunno how old is daughter is, but I'm sure 
she didn't spread her legs and be fine with her dad fucking her. She 
probably screamed and cried too. Definitely rape. No way around minimizing 
his behavior and no reason anyone should.
comments.author: renzokata

comments.text:
So you think rape and molestation are the same thing? Then why are they two 
different words with two different definitions? The stupidity of some 
people is astounding.
comments.author: Trevor Colby

comments.text:
Can you show me the difference between shutting up and shutting the fuck 
up? You must be a DuPont
comments.author: MC Hammer daddy

comments.text: It depends on the circumstance but I think generally rape is worse.
comments.author: Trevor Colby

comments.text: Equally evil, especially if kids are involved
comments.author: H Tsui

comments.text: +Jeff Dawson I can't tell if you're being sarcastic or not, I hope you are.
comments.author: Trevor Colby

comments.text: +Trevor Colby You are still stupid ass!
comments.author: Jeff Dawson

comments.text:
Rape: 1. the unlawful compelling of a person through physical force or 
duress to have sexual intercourse.
2. any act of sexual intercourse that is forced upon a person.
http://dictionary.reference.com/browse/rape?s=t
Molestation: 2. to make indecent sexual advances to.
3. to assault sexually
http://dictionary.reference.com/browse/molestation?s=t
Maybe you should consider learning proper English before calling other 
people "stupid ass".
comments.author: Trevor Colby

comments.text: Does it really matter molestation is a form of rape you stupid ass!
comments.author: Larry Metheney

top_comment.text: I feel like this deserves a lynch mob. For him and the judge.﻿
top_comment.author: Orion “Holt” Jacoby

comments.text:
Good idea, if the courts will not punish him, let the people do it. Fuck 
that guy. Same judge probably sentenced a pot dealer to a few years in 
prison right before that court case. Lawless America.
comments.author: renzokata

comments.text: http://www.thepetitionsite.com/873/572/063/fire-judge-jan-jurden/
+LiberalVermonter You didn't read my comment very well did you,
comments.author: Sean McVan

comments.text:
+Orion Jacoby I'm sure everyone would want her removed. There has to be an 
Investigation to see if she just received a large some Money  @ the time he 
was Sentenced.
comments.author: VermonterKen

comments.text:
+Sean McVan A Mob would just make worse & will  harm more Innocent People 
than the Courts will.
comments.author: VermonterKen

comments.text:
+LiberalVermonter People go to prison as well when they are innocent.  Mobs 
and courts don't work, but if you could guarantee that the mob would just 
kill the person and not torture I would choose that.  Life sucks anyways, 
they would be doing the person a favor.
comments.author: Sean McVan

comments.text:
The judge corrupt or not needs to be fired. She had the option to put a 
child rapist in prison i don't care what her reason for not doing so are. 
Actually i do as it is the reason i want her removed from her position 
immediately. If she's corrupt as well she should get his maximum sentence 
on top of her corruption charge.
comments.author: Orion “Holt” Jacoby

comments.text:
+Orion Jacoby The Judge most be Investigated by the Authorities to check 
Banks to see if Judge just got a large sum of $ when he was Sentenced.
comments.author: VermonterKen

comments.text:
He was already convicted and admitted to what he did. I retract my request 
for lynching the judge but this guy needs to be removed from society one 
way or another.
comments.author: Orion “Holt” Jacoby

comments.text:
+Orion Jacoby If Lynch Mobs were allowed, it's inevitable that a Person who 
is wrongful Accused would be  Killed by a Lynch Mob.

So what are you suggesting get rid of the Courts have no, Trials & let the 
Lynch Mob decide who is Guilty  or not like in the 1300's?Or like during 
the Witch Trails in MA? There are Courts for a reason.
comments.author: VermonterKen

comments.text: Yea because you know child molesters are people too.
comments.author: Orion “Holt” Jacoby

comments.text: There should never be Lynch Mob under any circumstances.
comments.author: VermonterKen

top_comment.text:
No jail time... #thelogic  
Oh wait, but I just remembered jail and prison is worse than real life.
Rehabilitation centers should replace all jails and prisons!﻿
top_comment.author: Macario Patrick

comments.text:
+Macario Patrick I don't really give a fuck about people and their sick 
desires-as long as they don't HURT CHILDREN! How about this? Mandatory life 
sentence for child rape. Do the crime, you do the time. Those children have 
to live with that for the rest of their life. Fuck treatment for him. The 
children need treatment, he needs to be punished.
comments.author: renzokata

comments.text:
Why no? By putting people in jail, you're just sending people out into the 
world worse than the way that person went in.
comments.author: Macario Patrick

comments.text: No
comments.author: Joey Gomez

top_comment.text:
prisons should focus on rehabilitation for the good of society.... however 
people who do what this dupont guy did should be tortured and executed .I 
kind of understand why the judge said he wouldn't "fare well" in prison. He 
knows that the innmates, especially the ones who have a life sentence, will 
personally see to it that he gets tortured and executed.﻿
top_comment.author: Christopher Storvik

comments.text: yep
comments.author: Christopher Storvik

comments.text:
There's such a thing as isolation in protective custody. Where they put all 
the people under threat, informants etc. Or to one of the dedicated sex 
offender jails.
If it was the judges and prosecutors daughter he abused what would the 
outcome be?
Judges love to talk about deterents, handing out punitive sentances 
thinking that somehow everyone will think "Oh I better not do that or I'll 
get X years"
If people thought they'd get caught they would'nt do it in the first place. 
Dudes in court on charges usually dont know what kind of sentance they can 
get so that shht dont work. But let a rich guy off for something like this 
and everyone gets that message LOUD AND CLEAR.
There's two societies being carved out of one globally...and I'm not sure 
how much longer it'll be allowed to continue.
comments.author: dubbud74
